title: Sonoma
name: Eric K. James Vineyards
directions: in the Mercato just off the Square
content: A tasting room by day, but every Friday and Saturday the tasting room transforms into a New Orleans style music venue from 7PM-10PM. Grab a bottle of Pinot Noir and dance to some of the best Rumba-Boogie, New Orleans Swing, Creole Jazz, R&B and more in the North Bay.
